alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:58AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Susquehanna and northwestern Wayne Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1058 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gibson, or 13 miles east of Montrose, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Harford, Ararat, Lanesboro, Thompson, Starrucca, Gibson and Starruca. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 211 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
